meanings.definition: Having or showing an excessively idealistic outlook.
meanings.sent1: She was overidealistic in thinking everything would always be perfect.
meanings.sent2: His overidealistic beliefs often led to disappointment.
meanings.sent3: Being overidealistic can sometimes blind us to the realities of life.
meanings.sent4: Her overidealistic nature painted a rosy picture of the world.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of being overidealistic can be harsh.

meanings.sent2: Don't overidealistic your goals; make them achievable.
meanings.sent3: She overidealistic her ability to finish the project in one day.
meanings.sent4: Dreaming big is good, but don't overidealistic the possibilities.
meanings.sent5: It's easy to overidealistic when imagining the perfect outcome.
